info: The restaurant was founded in 1924 by the Agut family and has been operated by three generations of the same family. Since then, it has been a popular place for locals and tourists looking for traditional Catalan food in an authentic environment.
info-2: Restaurant Agut is located in a historic building dating back to the 15th century, and its interior retains much of the charm and elegance of that era, with high ceilings and stone arches. During the Spanish Civil War, the building was used as a field hospital, and the Agut family helped care for the wounded.
info-3: Since then, the restaurant has continued to serve traditional Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine and has gained a great reputation in Barcelona for its culinary excellence and welcoming atmosphere. It is known for its homemade dishes and attention to detail in the preparation of each dish.
